name: World of Tanks - Might and Metal Pack
name_original: World of Tanks - Might and Metal Pack
description:
Head straight for the battlefield action with the Might and Metal Pack! Take command of two heavy-hitting Premium tanks with quick-firing guns, and use the Gold, Premium Account time, and Boosters to enhance your vehicles and rise to the top!

This bundle includes: ·        German Tier VI Citadel Tiger I Heavy Tank ·        British Tier VI Sentinel AC IV Experimental Medium Tank ·        1,250 Gold ·        7 Days of Premium Account ·        (5) 1.5x Silver Boosters ·        (5) x3 XP Boosters

If you already have these tanks, you will receive the following as compensation: ·       Citadel Tiger I: 1,560,000 Silver ·       Sentinel AC IV Experimental: 1,420,000 Silver

NOTE: All Premium vehicles come with their own Vehicle slot and a mix of standard and Premium ammo.
